data.title: Who's Afraid of Gila Almagor?
data.meta_description: Life Is Hard for Diva Gila Almagor These Days. One the One Hand, She Is Embroiled in a Storm Involving Two Rival Organizations of Performing Artists. On the Other Hand, She and Her Husband Are Reportedly Earning Vast Sums of Money at Habimah Theater, While in Between, She Is Trying to Make Good as a Local Politician. But Almagor Is Not the Type of Woman Who Will Back Down or Forgive All Kinds of Idiots Who Don't Know How Much Smarter I Am Than Them'
